code: export const formatNumber=num=>{return new Intl.NumberFormat('en',{notation:'compact',compactDisplay:'short',maximumFractionDigits:3}).format(num);};export const formatNumberWithCommas=value=>{const num=parseFloat(value);return isNaN(num)?'——':num.toLocaleString('en-US',{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2});};export const formatCost=value=>{const rounded=Math.round(value*100)/100;const str=rounded.toString();return str.endsWith('.0')?str.slice(0,-2):str;};
